column1: Income estimates for small areas, England & Wales, financial year ending 2023
This workbook contains data tables published alongside the Office for National Statistics' Income estimates for small areas, England & Wales, financial year ending 2023.
Income estimates for small areas, England & Wales, financial year ending 2023
To ensure accurate use of the data, please read the notes and metadata first. They include essential details on methodology, limitations, and caveats.
This data was published at 09:30 on Wednesday 10 December 2025.
For future publication dates, see the ONS release calendar.
The geographic codes are 9 digits long and are used as geography identifiers.
Admin and Modelled Income Estimates team
